definition: of any of various dull tannish or grey colors, building material consisting of a piece of rock hewn in a definite shape for a special purpose, remove the pits from
details:
adjective
- of any of various dull tannish or grey colors
noun
- building material consisting of a piece of rock hewn in a definite shape for a special purpose
= example: building material consisting of a piece of rock hewn in a definite shape for a special purpose
- a lack of feeling or expression or movement
= example: a lack of feeling or expression or movement
- a lump or mass of hard consolidated mineral matter
= synonyms: rock
- the hard inner (usually woody) layer of the pericarp of some fruits (as peaches or plums or cherries or olives) that contains the seed
= example: the hard inner (usually woody) layer of the pericarp of some fruits (as peaches or plums or cherries or olives) that contains the seed
= synonyms: pit, endocarp
- an avoirdupois unit used to measure the weight of a human body
- material consisting of the aggregate of minerals like those making up the Earth's crust
= synonyms: rock
- a crystalline rock that can be cut and polished for jewelry
= synonyms: gem, gemstone
verb
- remove the pits from
= synonyms: pit
- kill by throwing stones at
= example: kill by throwing stones at
= synonyms: lapidate
